acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

judgment.error: Order not uploaded by concerned court

business_details.Business: Accused Sri Rituparn Bordoloi is produced from the jail hazot and he is again remanded till 13.08.2019. Having very carefully gone through the submissions duly advanced by the learned lawyers of the both sides as well case diary I find that there is a ground for presuming that the accused person committed the offence under section 363 of the IPC and accordingly the charge is framed. The particular of the offence charge is read over and explained to the accused person to which he pleaded not guilty and claimed to be tried.          The section 363 of the IPC is triable by the Learned Judicial Magistrate. Hence the case is transferred to the learned Chief Judicial Magistrate, Diphu, Karbi Anglong for disposal. BA is asked to take steps accordingly. The superintendent of District Jail, Karbi Anglong is asked to produce the accused before the learned Chief Judicial Magistrate, Karbi Anglong on 13.08.2019. Inform him accordingly.
